trans-unit.source: Provides a way to translate property values between Windows Forms controls and Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) elements.

Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.PropertyMap> class to define translations between [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] properties and [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] properties in a hybrid application.

The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.PropertyMap%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.PropertyMap%2A?displayProperty=fullName> properties on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost> classes define mappings from one technology to the other.

For more information, see [Walkthrough: Mapping Properties Using the ElementHost Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/ms788740\(v=vs.100\).aspx) and [Walkthrough: Mapping Properties Using the WindowsFormsHost Element](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/ms788729\(v=vs.100\).aspx).
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.PropertyMap"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.PropertyMap"></xref> class with the given source object.
`source` is the source of the properties which are translated by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.PropertyMap>.
The properties which are mapped in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.PropertyMap> must exist on <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.PropertyMap.SourceObject%2A>.
<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.PropertyTranslator> delegates are called using the current property values on <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.PropertyMap.SourceObject%2A>.
The object which has the properties to be translated.
Adds a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.PropertyTranslator"></xref> delegate for the given property to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.PropertyMap"></xref>.
When setting, if no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.PropertyTranslator> exists for `propertyName`, the new delegate is added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.PropertyMap>.
If a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.PropertyTranslator> already exists for `propertyName`, an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is raised.
The name of the property to map.
The delegate which is called when propertyName changes.
propertyName has an existing mapping.
Runs the property translator for the given property, based on the source object's current property value.
The name of the property to translate.
The property given by propertyName does not exist on .
Runs the property translator for each mapped property, based on the source object's current property values.
Removes all property mappings.
Gets a value indicating whether the given property is mapped.
The name of the property to search for.
`true` if propertyName exists in the property map; otherwise, `false`.
Gets a collection of property mappings which are defined by default.
For a list of default property mappings, see [Windows Forms and WPF Property Mapping](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-property-mapping.md).
A <xref href="System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary`2"></xref> which maps property names to corresponding <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.PropertyTranslator"></xref> delegates.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.PropertyTranslator"></xref> delegate for the given property.
When setting, if no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.PropertyTranslator> exists for `propertyName`, the new delegate is added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.PropertyMap>.
If a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.PropertyTranslator> already exists for `propertyName`, it is replaced.
The name of the property to map.
The delegate corresponding to the property specified by propertyName.
propertyName is `null` or an empty string; the specified delegate is `null`.
The property given by propertyName does not exist on .
Gets an <xref href="System.Collections.ICollection"></xref> object containing the property names in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.PropertyMap"></xref> collection.
An <xref href="System.Collections.ICollection"></xref> object containing the property names of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.PropertyMap"></xref> collection.
Occurs when an exception is raised by a property translator.

Handlers for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.PropertyMap.PropertyMappingError> event can optionally raise the exception by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.IntegrationExceptionEventArgs.ThrowException%2A> flag on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.PropertyMappingExceptionEventArgs>.
Deletes the given property from the mapping.
The name of the property to remove.
propertyName is `null`.
Restores the default property mapping for the given property.
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.PropertyMap.Reset%2A> method has the following effects on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.PropertyMap>.
A default property mapping that has been removed is restored.
A property mapping that has been added is removed.
A default property mapping that has been overridden is restored to its default value.
The name of the property to restore.
propertyName is `null`.
Restores the default property mappings.
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.PropertyMap.ResetAll%2A> method has the following effects on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.PropertyMap>.
Default property mappings that have been removed are restored.
Property mappings that have been added are removed.
Default property mappings that have been overridden are restored to their default values.
Gets the object which has the properties to be translated.
The properties which are mapped in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.PropertyMap> must exist on <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.PropertyMap.SourceObject%2A>.
The object which has the properties to be translated.
Gets an <xref href="System.Collections.ICollection"></xref> containing the property translators in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.PropertyMap"></xref> collection.
An <xref href="System.Collections.ICollection"></xref> containing the property translators in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.PropertyMap"></xref> collection.
